participant_1.background:
I am trying to lose weight by eating healthier and exercising.
I am a movie buff who has a passion for collecting memorabilia from my favorite films.
I like music that reminds me of my family and friends.
i have a marketing job.
My family is supportive of my career choices.

participant_2.background:
I am a powerlifter who loves the cold.
I like to read the news and write my own stories.
I went to the beach with my family and boyfriend last summer.
i have one grandson and one daughter.
i work in a circus as a juggler.

content.text: Hello, what do you do for work?
I'm a juggler in the circus!
That sounds amazing! I've always wanted to be able to juggle.
It's a lot of fun, but it takes a lot of practice.
I'm sure it does. What are some of your favorite hobbies?
I love to read and write, and I also enjoy going to the beach.
I love to read too! What kind of books do you like to read?
I like to read a variety of books, but I especially enjoy historical fiction and mysteries.
Those are both great genres! I love a good mystery.
Me too! I'm currently reading a book about the Titanic.
Oh, that sounds interesting! I've always been fascinated by the Titanic.
It's a really good book. I'm about halfway through it and I can't put it down.
I'm glad you're enjoying it! I'm going to have to check it out.
You should! It's a great book.
